name: Netskope Tenant (Required)
description: This plugin is required to configure Netskope Tenant in Cloud Exchange. The Netskope Tenant will be used by the Netskope plugins to fetch the required data for each module.

configuration.label: V1 API Token
configuration.description: V1 API token to authenticate Netskope Tenant. V1 Token can be obtained from the Netskope Tenant Settings -> Tools -> REST API v1. V1 API token is only needed when sharing Hashes to Netskope.

configuration.label: V2 API Token
configuration.description: API token to authenticate Netskope Tenant. The Token can be obtained from the Netskope Tenant Settings -> Administration -> Administrators & Roles -> Service Account.
